input.label: Splunk Internal Files

choice.value: | search NOT (conf_app=system conf_context=default) NOT conf_app=user-prefs NOT conf_file=telemetry.conf NOT conf_file=ui-prefs.conf

input.default: | search NOT (conf_app=system conf_context=default) NOT conf_app=user-prefs NOT conf_file=telemetry.conf NOT conf_file=ui-prefs.conf NOT conf_file=ui-tour.conf

search.query: host="$tok_host_filter$" index=_audit action=add OR action=update OR action=delete path=*.conf path IN(*/etc/apps/*, */etc/system/*, */etc/deployment-apps/*, */etc/master-apps/*, */etc/slave-apps/*, */shcluster/*) | rex field=path "\/+(?<conf_scope>[^\/]+)\/+(?<conf_app>[^\/]+)\/+(?<conf_context>[^\/]+)\/+(?<conf_file>[^\/]+)$$" $tok_filter_nodef$ | eval _time=coalesce(strptime(modtime, "%a %b %d %H:%M:%S %Y"), _time) | table _time action conf_scope conf_app conf_context conf_file path | sort - _time
